title: maa rAmachandruniki
sahitya:
mA rAmacandruniki jaya mangaLam ghOra bhava nIra nidhi tArakuniki mangaLam 

caraNam 1

 mAruni kanna rAjakumAruniki mangaLam mAkulEni hariki mummAru jayamangaLam
   
caraNam 2

 bAhulEyAptuniki subAhu vairiki mangaLam bAhuja shUruDAjAnu bAhuniki mangaLam
   
caraNam 3

 brndAvana sthiramauni rAjArcituniki mangaLam rAjadharuDagu tyAgarAja nutuniki mangaLam
